description: This Dart file defines a `Responsive` class that provides static methods to determine UI layout parameters based on the screen size, such as padding, grid columns, card width, icon size, font scale, grid spacing, and grid delegate. It serves as a utility for responsive design in a Flutter app.

classes.name: Responsive
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods for responsive UI layout parameters based on screen size.

methods.name: screenPadding
methods.description: Returns padding values based on screen size for consistent spacing around content.

methods.name: gridColumns
methods.description: Determines the number of grid columns suitable for the current screen size.

methods.name: cardMaxWidth
methods.description: Provides maximum width for cards depending on device size.

methods.name: headerIconSize
methods.description: Returns appropriate icon size for headers based on screen size.

methods.name: titleFontScale
methods.description: Provides font scaling factor for titles to ensure readability across devices.

methods.name: gridSpacing
methods.description: Returns spacing value between grid items according to screen size.

methods.name: gridDelegateForCards
methods.description: Creates a `SliverGridDelegate` with cross-axis count and spacing optimized for the device size and grid layout.
